name: tentree To The Mountains T-Shirt - Women's
description:
This soft tee gets you one step closure to your happy place.Soft Treeblend fabric is made of recycled and natural fibres, giving you a clean conscience.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.Relaxed fit for easy comfort.
